caption.p: The mean response of individual species response ( SRs) to each IHA metric in the Treene (60 species, a–j) and Kinzig (134 species, k–t) catchments for horizon 2050 (upper row in each catchment, a–e and k–o) and horizon 2090 (lower row in each catchment, f–j and p–t). The bars are sorted by decreasing to increasing SR
